actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-494.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on (H.J. Res. 395) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes, and against consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on H.J. Res. 395 (continuing appropriations) and against its consideration.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on (H.J. Res. 395) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes, and against consideration of such conference report.
